thread.section_title: MediaXpress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MediaXpress | www.mediaxpress.net
thread.title: J F Delgado
thread.title_full: MediaXpress reviewed by J F Delgado

author: J F Delgado
title: J F Delgado
text: Our recording group was looking for a cost-effective way to produce our CDs and, while we had used a different service in my home state in Minnesota, we happily discovered MediaXpress, whose work is every bit as good and whose prices are way lower. The fact that they allow for orders as low as 25 is ideal for us, because we don't always want a minimum of 100, as other outfits require. Our only peeve, and it is small indeed, is that packaging is a little on the cheap side, but, considering the cost and the fact that it does not impact the quality of their work, it is not enough to stop us from continuing to order from them.
